reviewText: I really only got this dvd because it had Bandelero on it, and I don't want a copy, even if it is from Amazon, of this film.  All of these are enjoyable films and well worth adding to any action movie buffs collection..
I purchased this for my husband.  He's a big fan of Weatern Movies.  He is very happy with the western movie pack.
Very enjoyable especially the Mark of Zorro and Bandolero
Good movies. Wish the Mark of Zorro had been left in black and white though.
An exceptional film, well worth watching and adding to your collection.
